Package ch.usi.hse.exceptions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiError
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
    ApiExceptionHandler
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigParseException  
    DocCollectionExistsException  
    EntityExistsException  
    ExperimentExistsException  
    ExperimentStatusException  
    FileDeleteException
    Exception thrown when a file delete operation fails
    FileReadException
    Exception thrown when a file read operation fails
    FileWriteException
    Exception thrown when a file write operation fails
    LanguageNotSupportedException  
    NoSuchDocCollectionException  
    NoSuchEntityException  
    NoSuchExperimentException  
    NoSuchFileException
    Exception thrown on requests to read a non-existing file
    NoSuchTestGroupException  
    NoSuchUserException
    Exception thrown on attempts to retrieve a User by a non existing id id user name
    TestGroupExistsException  
    UserExistsException
    Exception thrown on attempts to create a User with an already existing user name or id
